catalogId.description: Identifier for the Data Catalog. By default, it is the account ID of the caller.

columnNames.description: Set of column names for the table.

databaseName.description: Name of the database for the table with columns resource. Unique to the Data Catalog.

excludedColumnNames.description: Set of column names for the table to exclude. If `excluded_column_names` is included, `wildcard` must be set to `true` to avoid the provider reporting a difference.

wildcard.description:
Whether to use a column wildcard. If `excluded_column_names` is included, `wildcard` must be set to `true` to avoid the provider reporting a difference.

The following arguments are optional:
